This vignette explains how to fit A-Ci curves with the `plantecophys` package in R. It is written to be usable for absolute beginners in R. 


```{r}
library(plantecophys)
```


## Preparing the data

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(acidata1)
```



## Fitting A-Ci curves

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=5, echo=-1}
par(mar=c(5,5,2,2), cex.lab=1.1)
fit <- fitaci(acidata1)
plot(fit)
```
